definition: condyloma (genital wart of viral origin)/Condyloma acuminatum

sentences.english: The differential diagnosis includes squamous cell carcinoma, verrucous carcinoma and condyloma acuminatum.
sentences.chinese: 鉴别诊断包括鳞状细胞癌，疣状癌以及尖锐湿疣。

sentences.english: These warts are non-malignant, occurring either singularly or scattered in clusters.
sentences.chinese: 这些湿疣并非恶性，单独出现或分散成簇。

sentences.english: Which is more suitable for drinking Smilax toxic heat in patients with condyloma acuminatum.
sentences.chinese: 其中菝葜饮比较适合尖锐湿疣毒热患者。

sentences.english: Intralesional injection of different interferons for CA was effective.
sentences.chinese: 局部注射不同的干扰素治疗尖锐湿疣具有一定疗效。

sentences.english: Methods Giving the patients intramuscular injections of serratia marcescens vaccine after the treatments of the microwave instrument.
sentences.chinese: 方法尖锐湿疣患者经微波治疗后肌注粘质沙雷菌菌苗。

sentences.english: Aminolevulinic Acid Photodynamic Therapy for Male Urethra Condyloma Acuminatum.
sentences.chinese: 氨基酮戊酸光动力疗法治疗男性尿道尖锐湿疣。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the method of transurethral resection by Holmium laser for condyloma acuminata in the urethra.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察钬激光经尿道治疗尿道内尖锐湿疣的疗效。

sentences.english: Even just close genital contact is enough to spread the condition.
sentences.chinese: 就算生殖器只是紧密接触，也足以使尖锐湿疣传播。

sentences.english: The key is to select the correct treatment of condyloma.
sentences.chinese: 治疗尖锐湿疣关键是选择正确的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Malignant tumor is the most serious complication of condyloma.
sentences.chinese: 恶性肿瘤是尖锐湿疣是最严重的并发症。

sentences.english: Objective To rise the cure of the condyloma acuminata in anal canal.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高肛管内尖锐湿疣的一次性治愈率。

sentences.english: Really has can treat the verruca acuminata from the body vaccine?
sentences.chinese: 真的有“自体疫苗”能治尖锐湿疣？

sentences.english: Wang Gang was eventually diagnosed as condyloma acuminatum.
sentences.chinese: 王刚最终被诊断为尖锐湿疣。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of ultrasonography in diagnosing urethral condyloma acuminatum (CA) in men.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价尿道超声在男性尿道内尖锐湿疣的临床价值。

sentences.english: The condyloma latum was commonly misdiagnosed as condyloma acuminatum.
sentences.chinese: 扁平湿疣疹易误诊为尖锐湿疣等。

definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
